## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `'hideTitle'` | `'hide-title'` | Defines if the title is visible or hidden. | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot               | Description                                 |
| ------------------ | ------------------------------------------- |
| `"default"`        | Slot for placing the list title.            |
